result.sql_query:
SELECT
  g.Name,
  COUNT(t.TrackId) AS track_count
FROM genre AS g
JOIN track AS t
  ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId
GROUP BY
  g.Name
ORDER BY
  track_count DESC
LIMIT 5;
result.response:
The top 5 genres by track count are:

| Genre                  | Track Count |
|------------------------|-------------|
| Rock                   | 1297        |
| Latin                  | 579         |
| Metal                  | 374         |
| Alternative & Punk     | 332         |
| Jazz                   | 130         |
